attributes.action: Return the NHS back to the British tax payers who fund it. A stop to free immigrant healthcare
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We ask that the prime minister to return our health service back to the British tax payers who fund it.
New entrants should only be entitled to free healthcare once they have payed into the system for a fixed period

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
